list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Initial commit for EcoMarket Info Hub app
Initializes the project structure for a new Flutter application, "EcoMarket Info Hub," designed to provide information about sustainable products.
This commit includes the foundational setup: - **Application Entry Point (`main.dart`):** Sets up the main app widget, defines a green-themed `MaterialApp`, and configures named routes for navigation (`/home`, `/category`, `/tips`, `/stats`, `/about`). - **Screen Implementation:** - `HomeScreen`: The main screen featuring a promotional carousel and a grid of ecological categories. - `CategoryScreen`: A detail screen to display information and tips specific to a selected category. - `TipsScreen`: A dedicated screen to list all available sustainable tips. - `StatsScreen`: Displays global environmental impact statistics. - `AboutScreen`: Provides information about the app's purpose and features. - **Data Models:** Introduces `Category` and `ProductTip` models to structure the application's data. - **Static Data:** Adds initial data for eco-categories and sustainable tips. - **Widgets:** Creates reusable widgets including `CategoryCard`, `TipCard`, and a `DrawerMenu` for consistent UI and navigation. - **Configuration:** Includes the initial `pubspec.yaml` with basic dependencies and project metadata.
